name: King's Home
description:
GGJ2019 Entry.

Home is where you are safe. 

As a king, guard your castle against invaders by using gate. Let in your friends to help you. 

How to play: Tap to screen for close or open gate and use that killing enemies(red chars.) or let your allies(green chars.) in. Be careful, if you kill your friends you will lose health. If you let them in to your castle, you will get extra health and points. For enemies, this is opposite. They attack you if you let them in, you have to kill them for gain points.
